reviewText:
This was one of the best Japanese movie I have seen with English Subtitles. I would totally buy it if it has English subtitles on it.
The direction and interplay of the characters was done very nicely. I saw it on a flight with subtitles!
Great, weird, and wonderfully done movie.  Funny and just a little bizarre -- I just saw this on cable (I get the Japanese channel at home) with English subtitles.
Yes, I also saw this on a flight and would love to buy a dvd with English subtitles. I'll pay 40 bucks or more if someone can provide this.
love this film!!! five stars absolutely - saw it on a flight and would love to be able to purchase it
